name: AREEBA KHAN
greetingText: No miles can keep us apart because love travels beyond distance. ‚ù§Ô∏è
wishText: Aankhon me teri Ajab si Ajab si aadae hai, Dil ko bna de malang ye teri wo hawayeinn hai On this special day, I just want to remind you how wonderful you are. May love, peace, and happiness always find their way to you. Wishing you a lovely Valentine‚Äôs Day! üíñ
